name: system_notifier
description: Opens streams (eg: journal logs) and triggers notifications.

config.name: command
config.description:
This is the long-running command (eg: `tail -f <filename>`) returning the stream of text that will be updated.
            A common option is the system journal output (eg: `journalctl -u nginx`)

config.name: parser
config.description:
Sets the list of rules / parser to be used to extract lines of interest
            Must match a list of rules defined as `system_notifier.parsers.<parser_name>`.

config.name: parsers
config.description: Custom parser definitions (name -> list of rules)

config.name: sources
config.description: Source definitions with command and parser

config.name: pattern
config.description: The pattern is any regular expression that should trigger a match.

config.name: use_notify_send
config.description: Use notify-send instead of Hyprland notifications
